form.AddRMDomestic_TechnologyId_container: Select the technology name from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_RawMaterialId_container: Select the raw material name from the dropdown.
form.addRMDomestic_RMToggle: Click here to add a raw material that is not currently listed.
form.AddRMDomestic_RawMaterialGradeId_contain: Select the raw material grade from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_RawMaterialSpecificationId: Select the raw material specification from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_CategoryId_container: Select the raw material category from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_SourceLocation: Select the source location code from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_Code_container: If you select the raw material code, the name, grade, and specification will be automatically filled.
form.AddRMDomestic_SourceSupplierPlantId_cont: Select your plant code from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_Customer_container: Select the customer code from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_DestinationLocation_contai: Select the destination code from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_HasDifferentSource: Click the checkbox to add source and source location.
form.AddRMDomestic_UnitOfMeasurementId_contai: Select the unit of measurement from the dropdown.
form.AddRMDomestic_Edit_BasicRateBaseCurrency: Click here to update the basic rate.
form.addRMDomestic_ScarapRate: Click here to update the scrap rate. After updating, changing the effective date is mandatory.
form.addRMDomestic_Circle_ScarapRate: Click here to update the circle scrap rate. After updating, changing the effective date is mandatory.
form.addRMDomestic_Jali_ScarapRate: Click here to update the jali scrap rate. After updating, changing the effective date is mandatory.
form.AddRMDomestic_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date from the calendar.
form.AddRMDomestic_Edit_EffectiveDate: After you've updated the scrap rate, make sure to change the effective date accordingly.
form.AddRMDomestic_Vendor: Select your vendor code from the dropdown.
form.addRMDomestic_vendorToggle: If the vendor is not available in the list, you can add them from here.
form.addRMDomestic_sendForApproval: Click here to send the raw material for approval.

addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_RawMaterialId_container: Select the raw material name from the dropdown.

addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_SourceSupplierPlantId_contai: Select your plant code from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_DestinationPlant_container: Select the destination code from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_HasDifferentSource: Click the checkbox to add source and source location.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_Vendor: Select your vendor code from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_vendorToggle: If the vendor is not available in the list, you can add them from here.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_UnitOfMeasurementId_containe: Select the unit of measurement from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_Currency_container: Select your currency from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialImport.AddRMImport_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date from the calendar.
addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_ScarapRate: Click here to update the scrap rate. After updating, changing the effective date is mandatory.

addRawMaterialImport.addRMImport_Jali_ScarapRate: Click here to update the jali scrap rate. After updating, changing the effective date is mandatory.

addRawMaterialSpecification.AddSpecification_RawMaterialName_contain: Select the raw material from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialSpecification.RawMaterialName-add: If you want to add a raw material to the listing, enter the raw material name here.
addRawMaterialSpecification.AddSpecification_GradeId_container: Select the raw material grade from the dropdown.
addRawMaterialSpecification.GradeIdAdd: After adding the raw material, this button will be enabled to add the raw material grade.
addRawMaterialSpecification.rm-specification-submit: Click here to add the material specification.

addRawMaterialAssociation.Association_RawMaterialName_container: Click here to select the raw material.
